name: Sherri Combs
offering: Affiliate Managers, Book Launches, Copywriting, Crowdfunding, E-Commerce Marketing, Email List Building, Ghost Writers, Image Consultant, Launches for Online Programs, Newswire Services, Podcast Services, Virtual Assistant, Working Capital
what_you_do: Sherri Combs is a trusted Senior Advocate, author, and public speaker who focuses on improving the lives of seniors and their caregivers by connecting them with local services and providing resources for long-term care planning.
who_you_serve: Sherri serves seniors and their families, particularly those who are navigating long-term care options and seeking reliable local services.
